00011 // path.cpp*
00012 #include "pbrt.h"
00013 #include "transport.h"
00014 #include "scene.h"
00015 // PathIntegrator Declarations
00016 class PathIntegrator : public SurfaceIntegrator {
00017 public:
00018         // PathIntegrator Public Methods
00019         Spectrum Li(const Scene *scene, const RayDifferential &ray, const Sample *sample, float *alpha) const;
00020         void RequestSamples(Sample *sample, const Scene *scene);
00021         PathIntegrator(int md) { maxDepth = md; }
00022 private:
00023         // PathIntegrator Private Data
00024         int maxDepth;
00025         #define SAMPLE_DEPTH 3
00026         int lightPositionOffset[SAMPLE_DEPTH];
00027         int lightNumOffset[SAMPLE_DEPTH];
00028         int bsdfDirectionOffset[SAMPLE_DEPTH];
00029         int bsdfComponentOffset[SAMPLE_DEPTH];
00030         int outgoingDirectionOffset[SAMPLE_DEPTH];
00031         int outgoingComponentOffset[SAMPLE_DEPTH];
00032 };
00033 // PathIntegrator Method Definitions
00034 void PathIntegrator::RequestSamples(Sample *sample,
00035                 const Scene *scene) {
00036         for (int i = 0; i < SAMPLE_DEPTH; ++i) {
00037                 lightPositionOffset[i] = sample->Add2D(1);
00038                 lightNumOffset[i] = sample->Add1D(1);
00039                 bsdfDirectionOffset[i] = sample->Add2D(1);
00040                 bsdfComponentOffset[i] = sample->Add1D(1);
00041                 outgoingDirectionOffset[i] = sample->Add2D(1);
00042                 outgoingComponentOffset[i] = sample->Add1D(1);
00043         }
00044 }
00045 Spectrum PathIntegrator::Li(const Scene *scene,
00046                 const RayDifferential &r, const Sample *sample,
00047                 float *alpha) const {
00048         // Declare common path integration variables
00049         Spectrum pathThroughput = 1., L = 0.;
00050         RayDifferential ray(r);
00051         bool specularBounce = false;
00052         for (int pathLength = 0; ; ++pathLength) {
00053                 // Find next vertex of path
00054                 Intersection isect;
00055                 if (!scene->Intersect(ray, &isect)) {
00056                         // Stop path sampling since no intersection was found
00057                         if (pathLength == 0 && alpha) {
00058                                 if (L != 0.) *alpha = 1.;
00059                                 else *alpha = 0.;
00060                         }
00061                         break;
00062                 }
00063                 if (pathLength == 0) {
00064                         r.maxt = ray.maxt;
00065                         if (alpha) *alpha = 1.;
00066                 }
00067                 else
00068                         pathThroughput *= scene->Transmittance(ray);
00069                 // Possibly add emitted light at path vertex
00070                 if (pathLength == 0 || specularBounce)
00071                         L += pathThroughput * isect.Le(-ray.d);
00072                 // Evaluate BSDF at hit point
00073                 BSDF *bsdf = isect.GetBSDF(ray);
00074                 // Sample illumination from lights to find path contribution
00075                 const Point &p = bsdf->dgShading.p;
00076                 const Normal &n = bsdf->dgShading.nn;
00077                 Vector wo = -ray.d;
00078                 if (pathLength < SAMPLE_DEPTH)
00079                         L += pathThroughput *
00080                                 UniformSampleOneLight(scene, p, n,
00081                                         wo, bsdf, sample,
00082                                         lightPositionOffset[pathLength],
00083                                         lightNumOffset[pathLength],
00084                                         bsdfDirectionOffset[pathLength],
00085                                         bsdfComponentOffset[pathLength]);
00086                 else
00087                         L += pathThroughput *
00088                                 UniformSampleOneLight(scene, p, n,
00089                                         wo, bsdf, sample);
00090                 // Sample BSDF to get new path direction
00091                 // Get random numbers for sampling new direction, _bs1_, _bs2_, and _bcs_
00092                 float bs1, bs2, bcs;
00093                 if (pathLength < SAMPLE_DEPTH) {
00094                         bs1 = sample->twoD[outgoingDirectionOffset[pathLength]][0];
00095                         bs2 = sample->twoD[outgoingDirectionOffset[pathLength]][1];
00096                         bcs = sample->oneD[outgoingComponentOffset[pathLength]][0];
00097                 }
00098                 else {
00099                         bs1 = RandomFloat();
00100                         bs2 = RandomFloat();
00101                         bcs = RandomFloat();
00102                 }
00103                 Vector wi;
00104                 float pdf;
00105                 BxDFType flags;
00106                 Spectrum f = bsdf->Sample_f(wo, &wi, bs1, bs2, bcs,
00107                         &pdf, BSDF_ALL, &flags);
00108                 if (f.Black() || pdf == 0.)
00109                         break;
00110                 specularBounce = (flags & BSDF_SPECULAR) != 0;
00111                 pathThroughput *= f * AbsDot(wi, n) / pdf;
00112                 ray = RayDifferential(p, wi);
00113                 // Possibly terminate the path
00114                 if (pathLength > 3) {
00115                         float continueProbability = .5f;
00116                         if (RandomFloat() > continueProbability)
00117                                 break;
00118                         pathThroughput /= continueProbability;
00119                 }
00120                 if (pathLength == maxDepth)
00121                         break;
00122         }
00123         return L;
00124 }
00125 extern "C" DLLEXPORT SurfaceIntegrator *CreateSurfaceIntegrator(const ParamSet &params) {
00126         int maxDepth = params.FindOneInt("maxdepth", 5);
00127         return new PathIntegrator(maxDepth);
00128 }
